entries.description: Add Cilium 1.13.6 as supported CNI version. Older 1.13.x releases are now deprecated.
Mark MLA Grafana dashboards as non-editable as they are managed by KKP.
Add missing cluster-autoscaler release for user clusters using Kubernetes 1.27.
MLA Grafana Kubernetes dashboards will no longer repeatedly ask to be saved.
Allow expansion of side navigation on small screen sizes.
Fix vSphere tags for initial machine deployments.
Openstack: take TenantID into account while listing networks, security groups and subnet pools.
VMware Cloud Director: fix an issue where the API Token from preset was not being sourced to the cluster.
